nodes.text: SE4-10 was a modified Industrial Automaton SE4 servant droid. Following Qual'om Soach's attack on the Nalmar crime family, Eelien Kirat decreed that all top personnel required protection. SE4-10, alongside SE4-12, served as camouflaged security droids for Kirat and Elana Nalmar. SE4-10 was fully capable of performing their regular duties, but if needed could deploy a blaster rifle hidden in the left arm, which fired from the palm of the droid's hand.
